rules: ALWAYS use latest swarm version (currently V4)
"run swarm" = execute via Swarm V4 smart router
All AI computation in cloud, never local
Rent Manager queries via rei-data-sync API

embedding_text: Swarm V4 preferences: Always use latest swarm version. Run swarm command uses V4 smart router. Swarm fast for quick queries via Groq. Swarm quality for Claude/GPT. Rent Manager data via rei-data-sync PostgreSQL API. Locations ULTRA (1) and REI (3). Auto-sync every 5 minutes.
